Financial Performance and Dividend Announcement

While specific financial results for the quarter ending May 1, 2025, are not available, it's important to note that the company announced its Q4 and full-year results for FY25 on May 28, 2025.

The company declared a final dividend of ₹160 per share and a special dividend of ₹375 per share, totaling ₹535 per share. The record date for this dividend was fixed as July 25, 2025.

Key Financial Highlights for FY25 (as announced on May 28, 2025)

Sales and Other Operating Income grew by 6% to ₹4,446 crore.

Profit After Tax (PAT) declined by 18% to ₹476 crore.

The Healthcare business segment led the company's growth, followed by the Consumer business.

Other Updates (from various dates, but relevant to the period)

The company's stock has underperformed compared to the Sensex over the past year.

There were key leadership changes announced on March 15, 2025, including resignations and appointments of directors.

The company issued a compliance certificate under Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018 for the quarter ending June 30, 2025, on July 11, 2025.
